function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of disinfectants containing phenolic agents","Impact":"Excessive use can lead to health issues and environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Use disinfectants with alternative ingredients, follow safety guidelines for use","Technologies":"Alternative disinfectant ingredients, safety guidelines for handling","People":"Users, individuals in the vicinity of application","Owner":"Manufacturers, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"High concentration of inorganic compounds for disinfection","Impact":"Overexposure can be harmful to human health and environment","Mitigation":"Use appropriate concentrations, follow safety guidelines for handling","Technologies":"Dilution technologies, safety protocols","People":"Users, individuals in the vicinity of application","Owner":"Facility managers, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of virus sustainability on surfaces","Impact":"Incorrect understanding may lead to inadequate cleaning and disinfection","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines and training on cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Training materials, communication tools for guidelines","People":"Cleaning staff, facility managers","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, public health authorities"}]}
